thread.title: Radiohead to perform in Israel in July - Israeli Culture - Haaretz
thread.title_full: Radiohead to perform in Israel in July - Israeli Culture - Haaretz

author: Itay Stern
title: Radiohead to perform in Israel in July - Israeli Culture - Haaretz
text: Radiohead, one of the most iconic and trailblazing rock bands of the 20th century, will perform at Tel Aviv's Hayarkon Park in July, as part of their summer European tour. Information concerning the date and prices will be released in the next few days. The British band released "A Moon Shaped Pool," their ninth studio album, in May 2016 to critical acclaim. skip - Radiohead's A Moon Shaped Pool Guitarist Jonny Greenwood has collaborated with Israeli composer and singer Shye Ben-Tzur in the past.
